snippet.title: OFFICIAL ESBC ALPHA MOVEMENT TRAILER
snippet.description:
Fight fans! Here's our latest Alpha Footage from eSports Boxing Club! Many of you have been eager to see how the game has evolved since our first trailer; We're delighted to show you how our new revolutionary movement system is shaping up in ESBC!

Check out the full roster on our website, follow our social media for updates, and wishlist the game on Steam using the links below:

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1451190/Undisputed/
Website: https://playundisputed.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayUndisputed
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/undisputed_sci/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlayUndisputed/
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@playundisputed

Developed by Steel City Interactive & Ten24
#BecomeUndisputed #boxing #boxinggame #fightinggames
